## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist">ArgList</a> - Ordered collection of driver arguments.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist">ArgList</a> class manages a list of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg">Arg</a> instances as well as auxiliary data and convenience methods to allow Tools to quickly check for the presence of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arg">Arg</a> instances for a particular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option">Option</a> and to iterate over groups of arguments.

Definition at line 116 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h">ArgList.h</a>.

## Translation Utilities

### addAllArgs {#a8a832028dff8abb97e1b9fec4987b13a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ArgList::addAllArgs (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/opt/#a2ceb2416aeccdb4b087e29abc8c6b52f">ArgStringList</a> &amp; Output, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/optspecifier">OptSpecifier</a> &gt; Ids) const</>}>
Render all arguments matching any of the given ids.

This is a nicer interface when you don&#39;t have a list of Ids to exclude.

### hasFlag {#af4ede33e90efaf90c6534f43b3cfbffc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ArgList::hasFlag (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/optspecifier">OptSpecifier</a> Pos, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/optspecifier">OptSpecifier</a> Neg, bool Default) const</>}>
hasFlag - Given an option <code>Pos</code> and its negative form <code>Neg</code>, return true if the option is present, false if the negation is present, and <code>Default</code> if neither option is given.

If both the option and its negation are present, the last one wins.
